front.title: Expressing SNMP SMI Textual Conventions in XML Schema Definition Language

abstract.t: This memo defines the IETF standard expression of Structure of Management Information (SMI) textual conventions in Extensible Markup Language (XML) Schema Definition (XSD) language. The primary objective of this memo is to enable the production of XML documents that are as faithful to the SMI as possible, using XSD as the validation mechanism.
